summary: Quartz is a very common mineral made of silica, found in many rocks. It has a unique structure where silicon and oxygen atoms form a strong, repeating pattern. This makes quartz very hard, ranking 7 on the Mohs scale. There are two types: α-quartz and β-quartz, which form at different temperatures. Quartz is often used in jewelry and art because of its beauty and durability. It can be found in many colors, and some types are precious gemstones.
title: Quartz
